altername_name: プリパラ オールアイドルパーフェクトステージ!
name: PriPara: All Idol Perfect Stage!
overview: A large gathering of PriPara idols! A dream god dream stage begins in paradise~! The long-awaited Nintendo Switch software version of the "PriPara" series, a kids cabinet game with 4.4 million registered users, is now available! Over the four years from "PriPara" started in 2014 to "Idol Time PriPara" in 2017, the beautiful and exciting game mode has been super ported! You can create up to 6 "my characters" that are the alter ego of the player! You can create your own idol by combining a wide variety of my character parts! The PriPara idols that appear are an all-star lineup of "30 people + α"! More than 1,300 types of outfit items that have been popular in the past are included! You can coordinate freely. In addition to 15 anime live songs, the live songs are a super volume that includes 17 game songs! My character is the main character in the Nintendo Switch original "Story Mode"! In addition, "Anime Story" where you can enjoy the digest story of PriPara anime is also included! Compatible with all Nintendo Switch play modes, you can enjoy the excitement of an arcade game machine at home or outside.
